name: Magic Manny
description:
Magic Manny

In this Magical RPG, Manny Awakens to discover He is another Time and Place.

He must Develop his Magic Skills and Level up.

Help him to Fend off hordes of undead skeletons and evil drones.

Each section of the game offers a chance to learn more magic abilities.

Each foe challenges You more as You progress and try to survive.

*** Challenge ***

"Steamy Streamer" Challenge - Get ALL of the Archor Games products available on Steam and Stream ALL of them Beginning to End.
